import React from 'react'; const SettingsPanel = ({ settings, onSettingsChange, detectedLanguage }) => { const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { onSettingsChange(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; return (
); }; export default SettingsPanel;
